overview:
Jeff has over 14 years experience in consumer marketing management and business strategy at leading web and mobile companies.

Jeff joined Shazam Entertainment in September 2010 and is leading a variety of marketing initiatives including user acquisition and retention, engagement, email, and partner promotions for Shazam’s media discovery application and product.

Prior to Shazam, Jeff was Senior Director, Marketing at FooMojo and led web and mobile marketing strategies for FooMojo’s FooPets social gaming product. His focus included acquisition, retention, viral growth, email, SEO and SEM.

Jeff was Marketing Director at Friendster for over 5 years, and was with the company from its early days, through the company’s re-start in 2006. He was part of the team that built Friendster into the largest social network in Asia and a top 10 website of globally in 2008, and successfully sold it to a large Asian media conglomerate in late 2009.

Earlier, Jeff held marketing management positions at Roxio/Napster, Priceline.com and Walker Digital, LLC. Jeff founded Internet radio site mixcycle.com and was also Promotions Director for WHUS Radio, UConn.

Jeff holds a BA in Marketing and Communications from the University of Connecticut.
